mapper.select: select count(1) total from (select * from message)

select * from ( select rownum rn,t.* from ( select id, username, title, context, to_char(delivertime, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') from message order by id desc ) t where rownum<=#{currentPage}*#{countPerPage} ) where rn > (#{currentPage}-1) * #{countPerPage}
